name: AI Escargot
description: World's hardest 9x9 Sudoku puzzle, created by Arto Inkala in 2006
author: Arto Inkala
notes: Named 'AI Escargot' because it resembles a snail. Requires advanced techniques including forcing chains and trial-and-error for human solvers. Considered one of the hardest 9x9 Sudoku puzzles ever created.
